# type

**Instance Property**

The type of the interface, such as Wi-Fi or loopback.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: NWInterface.InterfaceType { get }
```

## Inspecting Interfaces

- **NWInterface.InterfaceType**: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.
- **name**: The name of the interface.
- **index**: The system interface index associated with the interface.
